newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures finish sharply lower.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures finish sharply lower.

text.p: Aug 23 - U.S. debt futures finished sharply lower due to bond options expiration coupled with a stronger-than-expected July durable goods order report. One foreign-based firm sold nearly 20,000 five-year notes, which forced some locals to to sell 10-year notes and bonds as a hedge. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
